title: In The Aging Room With Rafael Nodal
itunes:title: In The Aging Room With Rafael Nodal
description:
This week we welcome Rafael Nodal, the owner of Boutique Blends to the show where we will light up his new Gran Retorno that is set to debut at IPCPR in Las Vegas. We will find out what to expect from the maestro behind Aging Room this year.

In the second hour we will dig into the Care Package and light up the Zino Z-Class while breaking down some of the insane amount of new blends set to debut this year with FDA regulations looming.
